attributes.action: ensure that the rights of the population are always placed before the rights of escaped criminals
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We cannot afford another farce like that created by the Derbyshire Police when they refused to publish photos of two escaped murderers. These two forfeited any right to protection, when they committed their crimes. Legislate now to ensure that 60 million Brits and their Human Rights always come first.
